profile.title: Profile
profile.tagline: product designer with development and AI skills.

whatIDo.title: My Mindset
whatIDo.description:
I believe every project should be simple and understandable.
Whether it's design or code — the most important thing is that it works for people and businesses.

My approach: minimum bureaucracy, maximum result.
whatIDo.summary: Also — I share my thoughts in my [Telegram channel](https://t.me/+iYATkhA5NoJjYTlk) and develop the IT community — [@TalentX](https://t.me/+SUU6SXFIp9owOTE0).

workExperience.title: Work Experience
workExperience.freelancehunt: Working on product, UX design, features, user scenarios, and design system.
workExperience.freelance: UX/UI for startups and businesses: over 20+ mobile and web product projects, full cycle from idea to final UI.

aiChat.title: AI Clone Chat
aiChat.description: Ask me about UX/UI design, development, pricing, or past projects like MOU.today and Holyheld!
